text: Insey pehle Nooh ki qaum bhi jhutla chuki hai, aur uske baad bahut se dusre jatthon (groups) ne bhi yeh kaam kiya hai. Har qaum apne Rasool par jhapti taa-ke usey giraftar karey, un sab ne baatil ke hatyaaron se haqq ko neecha dikhane ki koshish ki. Magar aakhir e kaar maine unko pakad liya, phir dekhlo ke meri saza kaisi sakht thi
